oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Model 1860 foot officer's presentation sword, owned by officer at Fort Negley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Model 1860 foot officer's sword presented to Capt. James E. White, 12th Ind. Lt. Arty., USA. The following is inscribed on the blade: "Presented to Capt. James E. White Comdg, Ft Negly By the officers of his command July 22nd 1864."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
